name: Badge
description: Compact label/status components built on button styles.

use: you need small status labels or counters.
you want badge styling consistent with buttons.
avoid: you need full-size buttons or interactive controls.

patterns.title: Variants
patterns.code:
Row(
  children: const [
    PrimaryBadge(child: Text('Primary')),
    SecondaryBadge(child: Text('Secondary')),
    OutlineBadge(child: Text('Outline')),
    DestructiveBadge(child: Text('Danger')),
  ],
)

theming: `BadgeTheme` provides default styles for each variant.
Variants are based on `ButtonStyle` sizing/density defaults.
accessibility: Keep label text short and readable.
do: Use badges for short labels and counts.
dont: Use badges as primary call-to-action controls.
